My first post was almost a year ago, so I don't remember it very well, but it 
was something about Zardus' pod falling out of orbit, smashing into an eagle 
on its way down, crashing into a lizard, and scanning the splattered guts of 
the two animals with its damaged scanners.

::Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike falls backwards as Skulletron's charge hits him. He quickly 
rolls to his feet, putting away his weapons as he does so. He wasn't bad at 
hand to hand combat, either.

Bloodystrike jumps forward, launching a punch at Skulletron's head.
